title: Loss forgiven where?
body: ????? Both whole teams are dcing all game long, where's my loss forgiven?

replies.body: oh fck i thought im the only one who had that problem cuz i was the only one who got dced. my team was really ahead and we had elder and were about to take baron but i suddenly got dced. we lost that teamfight so hard and enemy team just finished the game. demoted to diamond 5 rip

I wasn't able to find anything listing service issues in the last 12 hours. Did you see anything listed on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/) page or in-client about it? 

Typically if there are service issues, loss forgiven is turned on once our network techs have investigated the issue and confirmed it. Sometimes this leads to a small number of players who missed out on the *loss prevented*, while most players affected by it would still receive it. In any case, we can not retroactively apply loss prevented to an account. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
